person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Dutch forward Reggie Blinker had his indefinite suspension lifted by FIFA on Friday and was set to make his Sheffield Wednesday comeback against Liverpool on Saturday .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Reggie Blinker |
| FIFA |

Reggie Blinker is a Dutch forward. FIFA is the Fédération Internationale de Football Association.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Reggie Blinker |
| FIFA |

Reggie Blinker is a Dutch forward. FIFA is the Fédération Internationale de Football Association. The paragraph mentions "Dutch forward Reggie Blinker" and "FIFA", which are clearly referring to persons. Other entities such as "had his indefinite suspension lifted by", "was set to make his Sheffield Wednesday comeback against", and "Liverpool on Saturday" do not refer to specific persons and can be disregarded.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Dutch forward Reggie Blinker had his indefinite suspension lifted by FIFA on Friday and was set to make his Sheffield Wednesday comeback against Liverpool on Saturday .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| Sheffield Wednesday |
| Liverpool |
| FIFA - International sports organization |

Note: FIFA is an international sports organization and was mentioned in the context of a location (lifting the suspension at FIFA) so it was included as a location entity. However, it's primary function is as an organization and not a physical location, but since the paragraph mentioned a specific location related to FIFA, it was included for completeness. If the context was different and FIFA was only mentioned as an organization, it would not be included as a location entity.
